channel.title: Voule Auto Restarter --- Error :::::: HELP PLEASE
channel.description:
Thanks in advance!!!! heres what i fixed by me self::::
[code]@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title name Voule Auto Restarter "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls[/code]
in the voule because it was
[code]@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title name Voule Auto Restarter "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls[/code]
but i only had jdk1.6.0_05 .... but that wasnt problem this is :::::::: when i run "voule auto restarter"
[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn182/ywang/untitled-2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Voule Auto Restarter --- Error :::::: HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @nite-elve nite-elve
item.description:
@nite-elve wrote:

You need microsoft NET pack.

Read full topic

item.title: Voule Auto Restarter --- Error :::::: HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @killa4444 killa4444
item.description:
@killa4444 wrote:

Thanks in advance!!! heres what i fixed by me self::::

@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title name Voule Auto Restarter "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls

in the voule because it was

@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title name Voule Auto Restarter "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls

but i only had jdk1.6.0_05 … but that wasnt problem this is :::::::: when i run “voule auto restarter”
